mpq24.Description: I keep close track of where my money goes.

mpq103.Description: I almost never do anything reckless.

mpq57.Description: I often prefer to "play things by ear" rather than to plan ahead.

mpq251.Description: Before I get into a new situation I like to find out what to expect from it.

mpq172.Description: I plan and organize my work in detail.

mpq12.Description: I often stop one thing before completing it and start another.

mpq266.Description: I often like to do the first thing that comes to my mind.

mpq159.Description: I am often not as cautious as I should be.

mpq185.Description: I often start projects with little idea of what the end result will be.

mpq147.Description: I usually think very carefully before I make up my mind.

mpq136.Description: I often act on the spur of the moment.

mpq234.Description: Whenever I go out to have fun I like to have a pretty good idea of what I'm going to do.

mpq92.Description: I am more likely to do things quickly and carelessly rather than slowly and carefully.

mpq112.Description: When I need to buy something, I usually go get it without thinking what more I may soon need from the same store.

mpq195.Description: People say that I am well organized (that I do things in a systematic manner).

mpq124.Description: I tend to value and take a rational, "sensible" approach to things.

mpq243.Description: People consider me a rather freewheeling and spontaneous person.

mpq47.Description: I like to stop and think things over before I do them.

mpq70.Description: I don't like to start a project until I know exactly how to do it.

mpq79.Description: I am very levelheaded, usually have both feet on the ground.

mpq219.Description: I generally do not like to have detailed plans.

mpq2.Description: When I have to make a decision, I usually take time to consider and weigh all possibilities.
